name: Beat Roller
description:
Drifting the flow of the Rhythm, rolling through beats and feel the music. A lastest music game in this month! Let’s install BEAT ROLLER and enjoy the easy gameplay to relax with trending music song-playlist.
Let’s Rock n' Roll

MAIN FEATURES:
* Popular music sound-track.
* Easy gameplay and quick fitting.
* Game designed in 3D.
* A hundred level to challenging your skill.

HOW TO PLAY:
* Drag a ball on the screen to rolling
* Roll a ball through the sign.
* Try not to fail and match the music beats.
* Completed the song to collect coin and gems to unlock new music contents

Try it, you will love it. More fun feature is coming soon.

Enjoy the SPEED and the BEAT
